acz_csf_inhibition.notes: Clinical doses 1-4g/day produce 40-60% CSF reduction in humans

acz_icp_reduction_human.source: Birzis 1958, Gucer 1978 (human ICP monitoring with ACZ)
acz_icp_reduction_human.notes: Direct ICP measurements show 2-6 mmHg reduction

glp1ra_nka_inhibition.source: Botfield 2017 - in vitro CP cell line + rat telemetry
glp1ra_nka_inhibition.notes: Exendin-4 reduced ICP ~20-30% via NKA inhibition

bumetanide_nkcc1_inhibition.notes: In vitro and in vivo NKCC1 blockade

iih_baseline_icp.notes: IIH diagnostic threshold >25 cmH2O (~18.4 mmHg), typical 25-35 mmHg

rcsf_iih.source: Kaipainen 2021 review - IIH has increased outflow resistance

azd4017_hsd11b1_inhibition.source: IIH:DT trial pharmacology + cortisol reduction data

hsd11b1_nka_amplification.source: Inferred from AZD4017 ICP effect (-2.3 mmHg) + cortisol-NKA literature
hsd11b1_nka_amplification.notes: This is the critical parameter - needs to explain observed AZD effect
